typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(EmpId = substring(Column_1, 1, 4),
		EmpName = substring(Column_1, 5, 10),
		DeptName = substring(Column_1, 15, 2),
		Salary = substring(Column_1, 17, 5),
		MobNo = substring(Column_1, 22, 10)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		EmpId,
		EmpName,
		DeptName,
		Salary,
		MobNo
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		EmpNo as integer,
		EmpName as string,
		DeptName as string,
		sal as decimal(19,4),
		MobNo as long
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		EmpNo = EmpId,
		EmpName,
		DeptName,
		sal = Salary,
		MobNo
	)) ~> sink1
